name: Union Real Estate Company of Pittsburgh, Appellant, v. The Robert Morris School, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Union Real Estate Co. v. Robert Morris School, Inc.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Union Real Estate Company of Pittsburgh, Appellant, v. The Robert Morris School, Inc.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs to be borne by appellant.
Mr. Justice Cohen dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James G. Larrimer, with him Dougherty, Larrimer <Sc Lee, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Union Real Estate Company of Pittsburgh, Appellant, v. The Robert Morris School, Inc.
Argued March 16, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused May 21, 1965.
David R. Levin, for appellant.
James G. Larrimer, with him Dougherty, Larrimer <Sc Lee, for appellee.
April 20, 1965:
